statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_sales FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE total_sales > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_sales FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_sales FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, total_sales FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE total_sales BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01';

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_sales ON marketing_campaigns.id = campaign_sales.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'Summer%';
SELECT campaign_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_sales ON marketing_campaigns.id = campaign_sales.campaign_id WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN campaign_sales ON marketing_campaigns.id = campaign_sales.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_sales >= 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT sale_id, campaign_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_records ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT performance_id, campaign_id, conversion_rate, ROI FROM campaign_performance WHERE ROI > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales_records GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING AVG(sale_amount) > 5000;
SELECT cp.campaign_name, AVG(cp.conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance cp INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns mc ON cp.campaign_id = mc.campaign_id GROUP BY cp.campaign_name;

SELECT mc.campaign_name, sr.sale_amount, cp.conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns mc LEFT JOIN sales_records sr ON mc.campaign_id = sr.campaign_id LEFT JOIN campaign_performance cp ON mc.campaign_id = cp.campaign_id ORDER BY sr.sale_amount DESC, cp.conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM campaign_sales GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, sale_date, campaign_id FROM sales ORDER BY sale_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, product_id, sale_id, quantity FROM campaign_sales WHERE quantity >= 10 AND quantity <= 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns INNER JOIN sales ON campaigns.campaign_id = sales.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT channel_name FROM Channels ORDER BY channel_name ASC;
SELECT sale_amount, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, channel_name FROM Campaigns c JOIN Campaign_Channel cc ON c.campaign_id = cc.campaign_id JOIN Channels ch ON cc.channel_id = ch.channel_id;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT channel_name FROM Channels ORDER BY channel_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.campaign_name, s.sale_date, s.sale_amount FROM Campaigns c JOIN Sales s ON c.campaign_id = s.campaign_id;
